abstract: Mark Oppenheimer Beliefs column notes that Catholics on left and right support Roman Catholic church’s opposition to executions, but gaps remain on other issues, like same-sex marriage and abortion.
lead_paragraph: On March 5, two liberal and two conservative publications shared an editorial supporting the Roman Catholic church’s opposition to executions. On other issues, like same-sex marriage and abortion, gaps remain.

headline.main: Catholics on Left and Right Find Common Ground Opposing Death Penalty
headline.print_headline: Catholics on Left and Right Find Common Ground Opposing Death Penalty
